## PR Checklist (Process v3.3.1 — Sprint Closure)

Tick all that apply. For sprint closure PRs, include the 11‑artifact template set.

- [ ] Linked to closure folder under `sprint-management/archive/<sprint-id>/`
- [ ] Quality Assessment Report included
- [ ] ADR Impact Analysis included
- [ ] Memory Extract Report included
- [ ] Key Decisions Log included
- [ ] Technical Metrics Data (JSON) included
- [ ] Outstanding Work Analysis included
- [ ] Sprint Retrospective included
- [ ] Remaining required artifacts per guide are present

References:
- Process guide: `sprint-management/TEMPLATE-USAGE-GUIDE-PROCESS-V3.3.1.md`
- Example: `sprint-management/archive/d-009-date-time-safety-2025-09-06/`

Note: For sprint closure PRs, please add the `sprint-closure` label. This will enforce complete artifact checks in CI.
